Replace.Text: After the capital is established, Tokiwa Nanatsu will fight, the [ICON_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE] industrial zone adjacent to the coast +4 [ICON_Production] productivity, +1 [ICON_GreatEngineer] great engineer point, the [ICON_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB] business adjacent to the [ICON_DISTRICT_CITY_CENTER] city center Center +4 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, +5 [ICON_Tourism] tourism achievement

Instead of the port area, get a lot of [ICON_Gold] gold bonuses when you are close to the city center, and unlock Junmeiyu's recruitment project[NEWLINE] Canghai Gang is a "mutual aid organization" rooted in Nannagi District, which began in the black market after the war. Organized by Chinese-born Japanese, it grew over time. Most of the current members are the children and grandchildren of the original members. And Chun Meiyu is the youngest member of the grandchildren.
Living in "Natsume Study", she likes books the most. [NEWLINE]When you go to the library and library, you forget about eating and sleeping. [NEWLINE]A life surrounded by books is paradise for her.
I have vaguely seen the future of the Canghai Gang growing stronger.
I will face my destiny head-on without running away, and then change this destiny. My life is up to me.
My favorite words are things like "leisurely" "ordinary" "smooth". A world full of excitement Just reading a book is enough...
Who do you say is the little one
Likes civs that declare friendship, dislikes civs that don't

Initially unlock the "Chemistry" technology Eureka, get 75 points of [ICON_Science] technology value, the [ICON_DISTRICT_CAMPUS] college adjacent to the [ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] theater square +1 [ICON_Amenities] livability, the [ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] theater square +2[ ICON_Science] science value

Kamihama's wonderful "rumor". [NEWLINE]Mysterious tables and chairs that exist in Suide Commercial Street. [NEWLINE]The girl who shows up there can solve any trouble. [NEWLINE]Lost lambs, go to seek help from that girl today.

The goal is to become a fashion designer who can resonate with people all over the world! [NEWLINE]Towards my dreams, I'm honing my fashion sense day in and day out. [NEWLINE]It's hard to hide the surprise of her unique design sense. [NEWLINE]Knowing that it would be this kind of reaction, she continued to work hard without being discouraged.
People who commit suicide...are they weak? But...as long as this world...can allow the weak to live...that's what I think...
Because I'm a hot-blooded hot girl, I'm directly happy about this kind of thingâ€”!
"Wow! Wow! So cute! [NEWLINE] Oh no! Oh no! I really want it! [NEWLINE] I want to wear this pair of shoes! Really! [NEWLINE]...so the price is too high Can you be any cuter?"
Who do you say is the little one
Likes civs that declare friendship, dislikes civs that don't
If you hear strange laughter, that is a sign. [NEWLINE]Glowing liquid, colorful smoke...an explosion that can blow anything away. Sure, the best [NEWLINE] exciting show is about to begin.
The possibilities of chemistry and human beings are infinite, and the future will be bright.
My favorite words are things like "leisurely" "ordinary" "smooth". A world full of excitement Just reading a book is enough...
The city where it is located gains ancient city walls
[ICON_GreatWriter] Great writer points gain rate increased by 30%
Every time a great person is obtained, [ICON_Science] technology value and [ICON_Culture] culture value increase by 1%
"Wow! Wow! So cute! [NEWLINE] Oh no! Oh no! I really want it! [NEWLINE] I want to wear this pair of shoes! Really! [NEWLINE]...so the price is too high Can you be any cuter?"
The city where you live +4 livability, loyalty +20
Troubles and the like will be resolved immediately!
A city with "Emily's Trouble Consulting Room" has +2 amenity, and the city's development speed increases by 10%
When attacking the injured unit, all units +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power, and defeating the enemy unit will get [ICON_Science] technology value equal to 50% of the combat power
Happiness is an additional +5% [ICON_Science] science and technology value for happy cities, and the bonus for ecstatic cities will be doubled.
Living in "Natsume Study", she likes books the most. [NEWLINE]When you go to the library and library, you forget about eating and sleeping. [NEWLINE]A life surrounded by books is paradise for her.

Kamihama's wonderful "rumor". [NEWLINE]Mysterious tables and chairs that exist in Suide Commercial Street. [NEWLINE]The girl who shows up there can solve any trouble. [NEWLINE]Lost lambs, go to seek help from that girl today.

The goal is to become a fashion designer who can resonate with people all over the world! [NEWLINE]Towards my dreams, I'm honing my fashion sense day in and day out. [NEWLINE]It's hard to hide the surprise of her unique design sense. [NEWLINE]Knowing that it would be this kind of reaction, she continued to work hard without being discouraged.

Organized by Chinese-born Japanese, it grew over time. Most of the current members are the children and grandchildren of the original members. And Chun Meiyu is the youngest member of the grandchildren.

"Sure enough, I feel that no matter what you do, the interest and momentum are very important..." [NEWLINE] "Yeah. Hmm, I understand ãƒ¼" [NEWLINE] "So... Let's decorate this chocolate richly ãƒ¼!" [NEWLINE] NEWLINE] "Yes! Come on, let's go! Yay!"

Provides 300 [ICON_Production] production points for wonder construction
Convert a diplomatic slot to a wild slot
When defending, all units increase [ICON_Strength] combat power by 5 points
Tohina likes to announce friendship civilizations
(You did not declare friendship with Tohina)
Tohina doesn't like civilizations that don't declare friendship
Would you like to build a friendship between us?
Just in time to test out my new potion
I'm sorry but I have to protect my interests
Welcome, now you can come to my department to watch various chemical performances
There is no time to receive guests now
i want to give you something
You are too disrespectful to seniors
Are you speaking ill of me [NEWLINE] (condemn you)
Tohino, as you can see... No, no, as you can see, I am considered an old man among magical girls, you can call me Tohino-senpai.
Do you want to come to my office?
let me tell you where the chemistry department is
we can get to know each other better
Respect for seniors is very important, and you did it
I seem to have heard someone speak ill of me...it's you, who do you think is the little one!
Would you like to form an alliance with us?
Your army is a problem to me
I am still the Minister of Chemistry and I will continue my chemistry performance
